channel.title: My Newest Server Update :)
channel.description:
Your job : rate from 0-10
My newest update :
At any random time,A grand champion will spawn at a random place in my servers main city,it will send a global message "The Grand Warrior has been Spotted"
at that piont the grand warrior has been spawned at a random place (it can place on 5 different places)
so if your strong enof u can go search for the warrior,if found u can try to kill it,but the warrior will use random magics and heal itssefl on random base.
he will drop very rare stuff like d-chain,and other stuff
also when a warrior is spawn there cannot be another one spawn,ones the warrior is killd there will be a chance again that there will spawn a warrior again at a random place on a random time :D
Rate plz :)

item.title: My Newest Server Update :)
item.dc:creator: @J112 J
item.description:
@J112 wrote:

I rate 8. It sounds almost like a genie random. Except it’s more cooler.

Read full topic
